dc_title_s: United States National Atlas Water Feature Lines, 2012
dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents the linear water features (for example, aqueducts, canals, intracoastal waterways, and streams) of the United States at 1:1,000,000 scale. This layer is part of the 2014 ESRI Data and Maps collection for ArcGIS 10.2. U.S. National Atlas Water Feature Lines provides the linear water features for geographic display and analysis at regional and national levels. National Atlas of the United States and ESRI. (2014). United States National Atlas Water Feature Lines, 2012. ESRI.
dc_creator_sm: National Atlas of the United States
